messages.title: Working hard for our area
messages.content: Chris will be a strong local champion for our area.

messages.title: Chris's record of action
messages.content: Chris Nicholson led a successful campaign against the proposed closure of local police stations in Streatham and Clapham, backed by a 3,000-strong petition.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It's Lib Dems or Labour round here

housing.content: Chris has been heavily involved in campaigning to defend local public facilities, including Clapham and Streatham leisure facilities and ice rink.

leaflet.personalStatement: Chris has the sort of real-life experience which is all too rare in politics today. Chris has built a successful career in business, advising governments worldwide on how to improve their public services.

contactInformation.address: Unit 6, Hermes House 59 Josephine Avenue, London SW2 2JZ
